SEARCH
Package org.uma.evolver.parameter.catalogue.mutationparameter

Class PermutationMutationParameter

java.lang.Object
org.uma.evolver.parameter.Parameter<String>
org.uma.evolver.parameter.type.CategoricalParameter
org.uma.evolver.parameter.catalogue.mutationparameter.MutationParameter<org.uma.jmetal.solution.permutationsolution.PermutationSolution<Integer>>
org.uma.evolver.parameter.catalogue.mutationparameter.PermutationMutationParameter
public class PermutationMutationParameter extends MutationParameter<org.uma.jmetal.solution.permutationsolution.PermutationSolution<Integer>>
A parameter class for configuring mutation operators specifically designed for permutation solutions.

This class provides a factory for creating various mutation operators that work with PermutationSolution instances. It extends MutationParameter to handle permutation-specific mutation strategies.

Supported mutation operators:

  • swap: Swaps two randomly selected elements in the permutation
  • displacement: Removes a subsequence and reinserts it at a different position
  • insert: Moves an element from one position to another
  • scramble: Randomly reorders a subsequence of the permutation
  • inversion: Reverses the order of a randomly selected subsequence
  • simpleInversion: A simpler version of inversion with fixed subsequence length

Required parameters:

  • mutationProbability: The probability of applying the mutation operator

Example usage: 

 
 MutationPermutationParameter mutationParam = new MutationPermutationParameter(
     List.of("swap", "insert", "inversion"));
 mutationParam.setValue("swap");
 MutationOperator<PermutationSolution<Integer>> mutation = mutationParam.getMutation();
See Also:
  • PermutationSwapMutation
  • DisplacementMutation
  • InsertMutation
  • ScrambleMutation
  • InversionMutation
  • SimpleInversionMutation
